QuestData.Title: The Trial of Shadow
QuestData.Description: Let us not be confined by the bounds of the mage repertoire of magic. I, for one, choose not to be classist. Necromancy can just be so much fun!$B$BTouch the Shadow Crystal to open a portal to my Trial of Shadow. Once there, move to the Altar when you are ready to begin.$B$BWeeping Souls shall begin to pursue you... your goal is simply to drag them into the traps. And be sure not to let them touch you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Trial of Shadow by luring 20 Weeping Souls into the shadow runes without getting touched.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're not very good at this. You're supposed to complete the trial BEFORE you come talk to me again. Make sense?
QuestData.RewardText: I like the way you move, apprentice.$B$BDon't you worry about where I got all the souls from. They were obtained in a perfectly humane manner, I assure you.
